mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_mall_task ( title, code, name, lot_number, step_id, series_id, worker_id, task_type, description, task_picture, finish_picture, gps_check, longitude_begin, latitude_begin, longitude_end, latitude_end, salary, salary_total, salary_increase, integral, effective_distance, outside_range_time, re_sign_time, limit_time, cost_time, review_time, admin, need_worker_numbewr, customer_number, can_priority, can_task_repeat_execution, can_worker_repeat_execution, can_topping, can_propaganda, can_repeat_receive, can_display_in_hall, note, state, online_date, offline_date, begin_date, end_date, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seriesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{workerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finishPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offlineDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_mall_task
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lot_number = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, step_id = #{stepId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, series_id = #{seriesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, worker_id = #{workerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_picture = #{taskPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finish_picture = #{finishPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gps_check = #{gpsCheck,jdbcType=INTEGER}, longitude_begin = #{longitudeBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude_begin = #{latitudeBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude_end = #{longitudeEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude_end = #{latitudeEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=INTEGER}, salary_total = #{salaryTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, salary_increase = #{salaryIncrease,jdbcType=INTEGER}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, effective_distance = #{effectiveDistance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, outside_range_time = #{outsideRangeTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, re_sign_time = #{reSignTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, limit_time = #{limitTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost_time = #{costTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, review_time = #{reviewTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin = #{admin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_worker_numbewr = #{needWorkerNumbewr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer_number = #{customerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
can_priority = #{canPriority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, can_task_repeat_execution = #{canTaskRepeatExecution,jdbcType=INTEGER},
can_worker_repeat_execution = #{canWorkerRepeatExecution,jdbcType=INTEGER},
can_topping = #{canTopping,jdbcType=INTEGER}, can_propaganda = #{canPropaganda,jdbcType=INTEGER}, can_repeat_receive = #{canRepeatReceive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, can_display_in_hall = #{canDisplayInHall,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, online_date = #{onlineDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, offline_date = #{offlineDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, begin_date = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
